useCoordinateSystemOfDisplay() - Method in class com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input.sensor.AccelerometerValuesListener
After this method is called, the values returned by AccelerometerValuesListener.getX(), AccelerometerValuesListener.getY() and AccelerometerValuesListener.getZ() will be in the current coordinate system of the display.
useDefaultCoordinateSystemOfDevice() - Method in class com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input.sensor.AccelerometerValuesListener
After this method is called, the values returned by AccelerometerValuesListener.getX(), AccelerometerValuesListener.getY() and AccelerometerValuesListener.getZ() will be in the default coordinate system of the device.
